## Verification Checklist
- [ ] **Student Exclusive**: The deal is specifically for students.

- [ ] **No Spam**: This is not an affiliate link or a coupon site referral.
- [ ] **Active**: I have verified the deal is currently active.

## Category
- [ ] I have placed the item in the correct category in `README.md`.
